#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define mod 1000000007

int main()
{
	int t,p,y,i;
	long long int n;	s(t);
	while(t--)
	{
	//n=1;
	s(p);
	s(y);
	y=y-2000;
	n=p;
	for(i=0;i<y;i++)
	{
	n=(n%mod*n%mod)%mod;	
	}
	printf("%lld\n",n);	
	}
}
